description: Episode of Series "Learning to be human". Based on the novel "Beat the Turtle Drum" by Constance Greene. Deals with a thirteen-year-old girl's reactions to the death of her younger sister, to whom she was very close. Starring Melissa Sue Anderson, Katy Kurtzman.
